title: I'm so sad
body:
5 mins ago i was playing ranked game and that was so important one because if i lose that game i was going to get demoted to diamond 5.
When i was loading i got disconnected twice but it was fine i wasnt late. My team was doing good job we got 2 inhibits and elder dragon and we were about to take baron but suddenly I got disconnected while my team was taking baron. My internet was fine i had good fps and ping. Oh actually one of my teammates also got dced at the early game. anyway I tried to reconnect rightaway but we lost that teamfight so hard and the enemy team just finished the game. I think this is not a problem of my computer or internet cuz i never had this kind of problem before. i know you guys wont put me back to diamond 4 but i just wanna say im so upset and pls fix this problem. thank u for reading

replies.body:
It really sucks these disconnections had to happen during this very important match! :'(

To prevent this from happening in the future, I recommend investigating to find the core cause to these terrible disconnections. Most of the time when I see this issue, a problematic local network connection or ISP routing are the cause. A good place to start is our [connection troubleshooting guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues), as it offers the most common solutions for this.

Let me know if you continue to have these disconnections.
